original_title: 放送デキナイ禁断霊映像 劇場版
overview: A collection of psychic videos that collects broadcast-prohibited levels. "Housewife who couldn't protect" who caught the boy spirit reflected behind the housewife who is abnormally sensitive to environmental problems, "Recovery" who was surprised at the appearance of the famous urban legend, Tonka Rat N, etc.
title: Broadcast Dekinai Forbidden Spiritual Video
